BioJS

Motivation

Modularity

Reusability

Unify efforts through open-source

BioJS at a glance


What?
A library of JavaScript components to represent biological data (+ guidelines)

Who?
Open source project. Everybody welcome to contribute as: Component Reusers, Developers and Contributors

When?
Growing community since its project start in 2011: 2 major version releases, about 150 components released to date, regular events

BioJS principles


A component should be easy to:

  • Discover
  • Use
  • Combine and integrate
  • Extend and Maintain

Discover - The BioJS Registry: biojs.io

Use

Install, configure, reuse

Combine and integrate

Extend

Maintain

Benefits

  • Share development - benefit from improvements from other developers
  • Enhance the visibility of your component in the scientific and industrial community
  • Modularize visualization from your web framework and make it reusable in other projects
  • Easily extend functionality of your component
